attributes.action: Have Renewable Power in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am doing this petition to try and stomp out global warming as much as possible. I don't mean for the whole country to have renewable power-but have as much renewable power as possible. Please sign this petition if you agree with me. I may only be thirteen, but that doesn't mean I don't care!
